dict.acceptation: 谈判达成；成功越过；议价出售；

sent.orig: Let us never negotiate out of fear. But let us never fear to negotiate.
sent.trans: 让我们永远不要因为惧怕而谈判，让我们永远不要惧怕谈判。

sent.orig: Let us never negotiate out of fear, but let us never fear to negotiate.
sent.trans: 让我们决不要由于畏惧而谈判。但我们决不能畏惧谈判。

sent.orig: How to negotiate is implicit in the process of formulating a contract.
sent.trans: 在制定一份合同过程中，如何谈判是不可言喻。

sent.orig: Last year I represented Freeman, Inc. to negotiate a sale with an Australian customer.
sent.trans: 去年，我还代表弗里曼公司与一澳大利亚客户谈了笔业务。

sent.orig: It is still our principle to negotiate with those in power in the Kuomintang.
sent.trans: 现在我们的方针还是以国民党当政者为谈判的对手。
